CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 5, 1955, pg. 1A reads: "Promoted - With Mayor David L. Lawrence administering the oath of office, Wednesday, Karl O. Jackson, left, became a police lieutenant, and, Albert L. Mills and Matthew Geis, right, became city detectives, as, left to right, City Councilman Paul F. Jones, Mrs. Sarah Kirk, Thirteenth Ward Democratic chairman and alderman; Public Safety Director David Olbum and Police Superintendent James W. Slusser observe. - Harris Photo." David L. Lawrence was Mayor of the City of Pittsburgh 1946-1959, Governor of Pennsylvania 1959-1963, and he died in 1966.David L. Lawrence was Mayor of the City of Pittsburgh 1946-1959, Governor of Pennsylvania 1959-1963, and he died in 1966.
TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh Mayor David L. Lawrence swearing in police officer Karl O. Jackson with two women standing next to him, gathered in Pittsburgh City Council Chambers at the City County Building
